abstract: The number of seconds to wait before you retry the request.
overview:
## Discussion

This property’s value is available only when the error’s `code` is [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKError/serviceUnavailable] or [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKError/requestRateLimited].

The error’s `userInfo` dictionary contains the same value as this property. You can access it using the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKErrorRetryAfterKey] key.

# retryAfterSeconds

**Instance Property**

The number of seconds to wait before you retry the request.

## Declaration

```swift
var retryAfterSeconds: Double? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property’s value is available only when the error’s `code` is [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKError/serviceUnavailable] or [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKError/requestRateLimited].

The error’s `userInfo` dictionary contains the same value as this property. You can access it using the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKErrorRetryAfterKey] key.
title: retryAfterSeconds
